scenes.description: Hololive English -Myth- performs the song 'Shiny Smily Story' in 3D for their first collab.
The members of Hololive English -Myth- greet the audience and discuss their 3D showcase journey.

subtitles.original: Shiny Smily Story
subtitles.english: Shiny Smily Story

subtitles.original: 憧れの舞台立ちたい
subtitles.english: I want to stand on the stage I've longed for

subtitles.original: らしく輝きたい
subtitles.english: I want to shine like myself

subtitles.original: 時に涙して
subtitles.english: Sometimes shedding tears

subtitles.original: また笑い合いたい
subtitles.english: I want to laugh together again

subtitles.original: 同じ未来を見たい
subtitles.english: I want to see the same future

subtitles.original: あの夢手にしたい
subtitles.english: I want to grasp that dream

subtitles.original: 踏み出した奇跡の一歩を
subtitles.english: That first miraculous step we took forward

subtitles.original: 息切らせ夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: I want to chase my dreams until I'm breathless

subtitles.original: ワクワク止まらない
subtitles.english: The excitement doesn't stop

subtitles.original: 空を超えていく 世界に見せてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll show the world that goes beyond the sky

subtitles.original: アクセスしてみない？
subtitles.english: Why don't you try to access?

subtitles.original: 後悔なんてここにない
subtitles.english: There's no such thing as regret here

subtitles.original: それぞれ誓った心で進むわ
subtitles.english: We'll move forward with the hearts we each pledged

subtitles.original: We're here!
subtitles.english: We're here!

subtitles.original: We're here!
subtitles.english: We're here!

subtitles.original: We're finally here!
subtitles.english: We're finally here!

subtitles.original: I'm so glad we're here. It feels like that sometimes.
subtitles.english: I'm so glad we're here. It feels like that sometimes.

subtitles.original: It's okay, it was still cute. Yes, it was cute.
subtitles.english: It's okay, it was still cute. Yes, it was cute.

subtitles.original: Hi everybody!
subtitles.english: Hi everybody!

subtitles.original: Hi everyone!
subtitles.english: Hi everyone!

subtitles.original: Myth is here!
subtitles.english: Myth is here!

subtitles.original: We're finally all together in 3D!
subtitles.english: We're finally all together in 3D!

subtitles.original: Welcome everybody...
subtitles.english: Welcome everybody...

subtitles.original: ...to the HoloMyth 3D Collab Showcase!
subtitles.english: ...to the HoloMyth 3D Collab Showcase!

subtitles.original: Let's start with some greetings. Gura, go!
subtitles.english: Let's start with some greetings. Gura, go!

subtitles.original: どうも、サメです！
subtitles.english: Domo, same desu!

subtitles.original: It's me, Gawr Gura! Thank you everybody for coming!
subtitles.english: It's me, Gawr Gura! Thank you everybody for coming!

subtitles.original: Hi guys! Hello! Is it on?
subtitles.english: Hi guys! Hello! Is it on?

subtitles.original: Next to Calli!
subtitles.english: Next to Calli!

subtitles.original: 死神ですです、破滅の加護ですです...
subtitles.english: Shinigami desu desu, hametsu no kago desu desu...

subtitles.original: ...森カリオペですです。All right, Dead Beats!
subtitles.english: ...Mori Calliope desu desu. All right, Dead Beats!

subtitles.original: Inaness go!
subtitles.english: Inaness go!

subtitles.original: Wah! Let me hear a "wah"! Wah!
subtitles.english: Wah! Let me hear a "wah"! Wah!

subtitles.original: Wah! Wah! Wah!
subtitles.english: Wah! Wah! Wah!

subtitles.original: Hi everybody, it's Ninomae Ina'nis. Yay!
subtitles.english: Hi everybody, it's Ninomae Ina'nis. Yay!

subtitles.original: Next to Ame!
subtitles.english: Next to Ame!

subtitles.original: Ame, come on! Show us what you got.
subtitles.english: Ame, come on! Show us what you got.

subtitles.original: Bubba-bubba! Bubba-bubba!
subtitles.english: Bubba-bubba! Bubba-bubba!

subtitles.original: Amelia Watson, number one detective! Hup-hup-hup!
subtitles.english: Amelia Watson, number one detective! Hup-hup-hup!

subtitles.original: Kiara, introduce yourself too! I forgot!
subtitles.english: Kiara, introduce yourself too! I forgot!

subtitles.original: Hi hi hi! I'm Takanashi Kiara from Hololive English!
subtitles.english: Hi hi hi! I'm Takanashi Kiara from Hololive English!

subtitles.original: And I forgot to do one thing that I really want us to do!
subtitles.english: And I forgot to do one thing that I really want us to do!

subtitles.original: Everybody, I want your hands to go to the middle!
subtitles.english: Everybody, I want your hands to go to the middle!

subtitles.original: One by one. Let's do our best today! Takanashi Kiara!
subtitles.english: One by one. Let's do our best today! Takanashi Kiara!

subtitles.original: Gura! Mori Calliope! Ina!
subtitles.english: Gura! Mori Calliope! Ina!

subtitles.original: Ame! せーの... イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Ame! One, two... Yay!

subtitles.original: So, everybody, this is our special showcase!
subtitles.english: So, everybody, this is our special showcase!

subtitles.original: We just performed the classic, "Shiny Smily Story"!
subtitles.english: We just performed the classic, "Shiny Smily Story"!

subtitles.original: How was that? I liked it! It was fun!
subtitles.english: How was that? I liked it! It was fun!

subtitles.original: Nervous, but we made it. It was difficult though...
subtitles.english: Nervous, but we made it. It was difficult though...

subtitles.original: ...practicing that one. We had to practice so many things.
subtitles.english: ...practicing that one. We had to practice so many things.

subtitles.original: I know! But I liked this part! I love this part!
subtitles.english: I know! But I liked this part! I love this part!

subtitles.original: We can see the chat! We're reading all your comments.
subtitles.english: We can see the chat! We're reading all your comments.

subtitles.original: Oh my god, they're so fast! I love the hype!
subtitles.english: Oh my god, they're so fast! I love the hype!

subtitles.original: I love the charms! Kiara... Heart, heart, heart!
subtitles.english: I love the charms! Kiara... Heart, heart, heart!

subtitles.original: Look at the spaceship in the back. Myth spaceship!
subtitles.english: Look at the spaceship in the back. Myth spaceship!

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, look at the space! We're here!
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, look at the space! We're here!

subtitles.original: Please look at this beautiful stage! Look at the satellite!
subtitles.english: Please look at this beautiful stage! Look at the satellite!

subtitles.original: Whoa, pretty! We have good reception here.
subtitles.english: Whoa, pretty! We have good reception here.

subtitles.original: Yes, this is the official Hololive English stage...
subtitles.english: Yes, this is the official Hololive English stage...

subtitles.original: ...as you may have already seen it in our individual showcases.
subtitles.english: ...as you may have already seen it in our individual showcases.

subtitles.original: Look, it's an alien! What's over there? Is that Earth?
subtitles.english: Look, it's an alien! What's over there? Is that Earth?

subtitles.original: Earth! It's Brazil! Hi! Everybody watching! Konnichiwa!
subtitles.english: Earth! It's Brazil! Hi! Everybody watching! Konnichiwa!

subtitles.original: Speaking of our individual showcases, up until this day...
subtitles.english: Speaking of our individual showcases, up until this day...

subtitles.original: ...everybody has done them. The first one was Ina!
subtitles.english: ...everybody has done them. The first one was Ina!

subtitles.original: How was it to go first? I was so nervous!
subtitles.english: How was it to go first? I was so nervous!

subtitles.original: I wanted everything to go, you know, perfectly...
subtitles.english: I wanted everything to go, you know, perfectly...

subtitles.original: ...so it kind of set a really good mood for everyone.
subtitles.english: ...so it kind of set a really good mood for everyone.

subtitles.original: You did great! You did awesome!
subtitles.english: You did great! You did awesome!

subtitles.original: And then the weekend after, yeah, was our Takamori weekend!
subtitles.english: And then the weekend after, yeah, was our Takamori weekend!

subtitles.original: Yes! I feel like we rocked the stage!
subtitles.english: Yes! I feel like we rocked the stage!

subtitles.original: It wasn't me this time, chat. It wasn't me! I'm just saying.
subtitles.english: It wasn't me this time, chat. It wasn't me! I'm just saying.

subtitles.original: But we did, didn't we? We did! That was amazing!
subtitles.english: But we did, didn't we? We did! That was amazing!

subtitles.original: So much fun! And the week after was Gurame!
subtitles.english: So much fun! And the week after was Gurame!

subtitles.original: Hey! It went first, Gurame weekend!
subtitles.english: Hey! It went first, Gurame weekend!
